docs.lead_paragraph: James Carrol, convicted of arson in the first degree, was brought up on Saturday for sentence. District Attorney moved for judgment in this case. The Court thought the evidence warranted the verdiet, and that the statute fixed the punishment. The prisoner was, therefore, sentenced to hard labor in the State Prison at Sing Sing for the term of his natural life.
